item.title: 1st visit to Urban Family Practice
item.description: About our practice We opened our doors to the community and began to provide quality health care on August 5, 1996. Since that time our office has expanded to include an array of health services. Among other services, our site is fully equipped and available to provide on-site lab services, x-rays, EKGs, spirometry tests, ultrasounds, venous doppler studies, holters, echos, stress tests and physical therapy. In addition, we offer on-site appointments for specialist's consultations and follow-ups. We are always expanding in this area of providing "quality and total health care under one roof." Dr. Raul Vazquez, M.D. and his entire staff and consulting specialists welcome you and your family to our facility. We are devoted to improving and maintaining your total health and well-being in a friendly, bilingual, comfortable, private practice setting

item.itunes:summary: About our practice We opened our doors to the community and began to provide quality health care on August 5, 1996. Since that time our office has expanded to include an array of health services. Among other services, our site is fully equipped and available to provide on-site lab services, x-rays, EKGs, spirometry tests, ultrasounds, venous doppler studies, holters, echos, stress tests and physical therapy. In addition, we offer on-site appointments for specialist's consultations and follow-ups. We are always expanding in this area of providing "quality and total health care under one roof." item.title: 1st visit to Urban Family Practice span
item.description: Sobre nuestra práctica abrimos nuestras puertas en la comunidad y comenzamos a proporcionar cuidado médico de la calidad de agosto el 5 de 1996. Desde entonces que tiempo nuestra oficina se ha ampliado para incluir un arsenal de servicios médicos. Entre otros servicios, nuestro sitio está equipado completamente y disponible para proporcionar los servicios en sitio del laboratorio, radiografías, EKGs, spirometry prueba, los ultrasonidos, los estudios venosos de Doppler, los holters, los echos, las pruebas de tensión y terapia física. Además, ofrecemos las citas en sitio para las consultas y las cartas recordativas del especialista. Nos estamos ampliando siempre en esta área de proporcionar "calidad y cuidado médico total debajo de una azotea." El Dr. Raul Vazquez, M.D. y sus especialistas enteros del personal y el consultar da la bienvenida le y a su familia a nuestra facilidad. Nos dedican a mejorar y a mantener su salud y bienestar totales en un ajuste del ejercicio amistoso, bilingüe, cómodo, privado.
item.itunes:author: Raul Vazquez MD
item.itunes:summary: Sobre nuestra práctica abrimos nuestras puertas en la comunidad y comenzamos a proporcionar cuidado médico de la calidad de agosto el 5 de 1996. Desde entonces que tiempo nuestra oficina se ha ampliado para incluir un arsenal de servicios médicos. Entre otros servicios, nuestro sitio está equipado completamente y disponible para proporcionar los servicios en sitio del laboratorio, radiografías, EKGs, spirometry prueba, los ultrasonidos, los estudios venosos de Doppler, los holters, los echos, las pruebas de tensión y terapia física. Además, ofrecemos las citas en sitio para las consultas y las cartas recordativas del especialista. Nos estamos ampliando siempre en esta área de proporcionar "calidad y cuidado médico total debajo de una azotea." El Dr. Raul Vazquez, M.D. y sus especialistas enteros del personal y el consultar da la bienvenida le y a su familia a nuestra facilidad. Nos dedican a mejorar y a mantener su salud y bienestar totales en un ajuste del ejercicio amistoso, bilingüe, cómodo, privado.

item.title: Raul Vazquez CV
item.description:
EDUCATION 5/1990- 6/1992 Family Medicine Residency Program Deaconess Hospital Humboldt Parkway, Buffalo, New York 8/1985- 5/1989 Buffalo General Hospital High Street, Buffalo, New York Doctor of Medicine State University of New York @ Buffalo School of Medicine & Biomedical Science 8/1981- 5/1985 Bachelor of Science in Biology Fordham University Bronx, New York EMPLOYMENT 8/1996- Present Urban Family Practice, P.C. 778 Niagara Street Buffalo, New York President and founder of a solo private practice, dedicated to serving the needs of an urban underserved community. 6/1992-Present State University of New York @ Buffalo School of Medicine Main Street, Bufffalo, New York Duties: Assistant Clinical Professor 2001-Present Eli Lilly and Company Pharmaceuticals Speaker on Zyprexa use in Schizophrenia, Manic Depression and Refractory Depression 2001-Present TAP Pharmacy Pharmaceuticals Speaker on Prevacid use in GERD 2000-Present Merck Pharmaceuticals Speaker on Singulair use in Asthma 1999-Present Searle/Pfizer Pharmaceuticals Speaker on use of Celebrex in Osteoarthritis 1999 GlaxoWellcome Pharmaceuticals Speaker Relenza treatment for Influenza 1998 Parke-Davis Pharmaceuticals Speaker Ominicef treatment for Otitis media and Acute Sinusitis 3/1994- 8/1996 Sheehan Memorial Hospital Michigan Avenue, Buffalo, New York Duties: Associate Director of Ambulatory Services and Emergency Room Physician 8/1990- 5/1995 Buffalo Columbus Hospital Niagara Street, Buffalo, New York Duties: Director of Emergency Services; Ambulatory, Emergency Room, and Chemical Dependency Unit Physician 8/1992- 6/1993 Niagara Family Health Center Niagara Street, Buffalo, New York Duties: Clinical Physician 8/1986- 8/1987 State University of New York @ Buffalo School of Medicine Duties: Teaching assistant in the departments of Histology/ Embryology, Biochemistry and S.T.E.P. (Science, Technology and Engineering Program) RESEARCH 1998 Phase III Trial, Parke-Davis Target (Lipitor effectiveness in hypercholesterol) 1999 Phase III Trial, Parke-Davis Reach (Rezulin effectiveness in Type II Diabetes) HONORS/ AWARDS 1999 Los Tainos Outstanding Community Service Award 1999 National Hispanic Heritage Achievement Award 1998 University at Buffalo, School of Medicine Family Medicine Department Teaching Award 1997 Hispanic Conference of Western New York Health Award 1995-Present Fellow and Board Certified of the American Academy of Family Physician 1992-1999 Loan Forgiveness Award Program 1992 TFM Resident Teacher Award 1986-1989 Regents Scholarship PROFESSIONAL AFFILIATION: President of the Latino Business Owners Association
Board member of Promesa Systems
Board member of Hispanic United of Buffalo
Board member of Los Tainos
Board member of Buffalo Economic Renaissance Corporation
Board member of Community Blue Medical Management Board member
Sheehan Memorial Hospital positions held: Executive Board chairman, President, Vice-President, Treasury, and Secretary
State University of New York at Buffalo Positions held: Student government policy president
